recipe.title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Cookie Smoothie Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ⅓ cup ; old fashion oat ; (35 g)
2 tablespoons ; nut butter, of your choice
⅔ cup ; milk, of your choice ; (160 mL)

steps.step: Add the oats, nut butter, banana, milk, and cocoa powder to a blender.
Blend for 30 seconds. Scrape down the sides with a spoon or spatula, if needed, and blend for another 30 seconds.
Pour into a mason jar or tumbler.
Garnish with banana slices and additional oats, if desired.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Add the oats, nut butter, banana, milk, and cocoa powder to a blender.
Scrape down the sides with a spoon or spatula, if needed, and blend for another 30 seconds.
Pour into a mason jar or tumbler.
Garnish with banana slices and additional oats, if desired.
